items.title: 3460 Miles
items.description: Hello!  Welcome to 3460 Miles, the exact distance between London and New York City as the proverbial crow flies. 3460 Miles is also an editorially-driven community aiming to digitally and physically connect creative and passionate individuals who live, work and travel between NYC and London. Enjoy!

items.title: codeword
items.description: Codeword is forum for developers, but also open to anyone with an interest in apps, software or tech. It is a place to share info, ideas, news, code samples, or for idle chat. Come join the conversation.

items.title: LFGSS
items.description:
London Fixed Gear and Single-Speed is a community of predominantly fixed gear and single-speed cyclists in and around London, UK.

This site is supported almost exclusively by donations. Please consider donating a small amount regularly.

items.title: The Peoples Republic of Pong
items.description: Ping Pong is a community of people who enjoy playing ping pong socially. We're predominantly from the UK. Take a look around and say hi!

items.title: CC London
items.description: A new traditional cycling club for the City of London and surround. All welcome whether you are an accomplished racing cyclist, want to race, or just new to cycling and want to venture further than City roads, then we are here for you.
